body: They're not biologically related, and they're both adults. Is there really an issue? Also did we really need that random asshole showing up in the story to say "I'm glad didn't stray from the right path"? Was his character really necessary to the story at all? I don't think so.🤔🤨😤😡
Yeah it should be tagged as inseki
Why are we sexualizing step siblings
This should really have an incest tag or something like that
